text: The lunch set here is fantastic! They offered fresh, flavorful mains that paired with well-balanced sides at a reasonable price.The presentation was beautiful, and the service was quick and attentive. Highly recommend for a satisfying midday meal! The ambience is great and will be back for dinner to try out their mains and cocktails.

Fantastic lunch experience at Taki!
The Value Lunch Set ($19.80++) is a steal - delicious food, generous portions, and beautiful presentation.
PAmbience is cozy and elegant, perfect for a business lunch or catch-up with friends. Happy hour deals are impressive too - 2 drinks for $22 and buy 3 get 1 free on spirits/wine.

If you are working in CBD and looking for a place to chill with your co-workers or friends after work, Taki bar is a great option. Set against a backdrop of Torii gates which momentarily transport you to Japan, it is an Izakaya üèÆ which serves affordable Japanese fare like donburi and maki rolls. We tried their Kaisen Don, Bara Chirashi Don, Dragon üêâ maki roll which contained prawn tempura (not dragon meat üòÇ) with a topping of sliced avocado and salmon sashimi, and Tori Nanban. I personally liked their dragon roll the best out of the dishes we ordered. If you are dropping by for lunch, go for their value lunch sets at $19.80++ and on Fridays, you get a complimentary upgrade worth $6 and a FREE beer or Happy Hour drink!
